ygData.subject: Re: Re: L46 weapon effectiveness
ygData.msgSnippet: Give me a day or two here to make my code not...um...junk. :)  Right now its just parsing and looking for You slash Allizasaur and You try to slash
ygData.messageBody:
Give me a day or two here to make my code
not...um...junk. :) Right now its just parsing and
looking for "You slash Allizasaur" and "You try to
slash Allizasaur"...i'll set it up to parse out all
the data for everyone in the log file and email you a
copy.

-David

[snip]
> So i've written a rather long and windy blurb
> here...just ignore me if you're not interested. :)

Definitely interested. What did you write your parser
with? Any chance I can get a copy? I wanted to take
a look at the damage from some of my friends and the
necro pet.

--
John H. Kim
